about_the_game:
A pack of DLC-exclusive decor to dress the Sandras up from stem to stern.

Contains the following sets:

　● Ironclad Warship Set

　　- Ironclad Warship Sails

　　- Ironclad Warship Hull

　　- Ironclad Warship Adornments

　　- Ironclad Warship Cannon

　● Undying Fleet Set

　　- Undying Fleet Sails

　　- Undying Fleet Hull

　　- Undying Fleet Adornments

　　- Undying Fleet Paddle Wheels

　● The Pikkard Set

　　- The Pikkard Sails

　　- The Pikkard Hull

　　- The Pikkard Adornments

　　- The Pikkard Artillery

　● Deck-oration Set

　　- Gardening Garniture

　　- Pirate Ship Deck

　　- Elegant Rugs

　● Sail & Hull Color Set

　　- Mana Wielder's Sails (Fire)

　　- Mana Wielder's Sails (Ice)

　　- Pirate Ship Sails

　　- Mana Wielder's Hull (Fire)

　　- Mana Wielder's Hull (Ice)

　　- Pirate Ship Hull

　● Shameless Sail Set

　　- Shameless Sails (Nordics)

　　- Shameless Sails (Monstrum)

　　- Shameless Sails (Lacrimosa)

　● Fanatical Flag Set

　　- Fanatical Flag (Adol & Karja)

　　- Fanatical Flag (Carnac Guys)

　　- Fanatical Flag (Carnac Gals)

　　- Fanatical Flag (Adol & Dana)

　　- Fanatical Flag (Aprilis)

　　- Fanatical Flag (Twin Goddesses)

*Items can be obtained by selecting the purchased content in the "DLC" tab of your Inventory, accessed via the Main Menu ingame.

*Once obtained, these items can be equipped in the "Adornments" section of the "Loadout" tab, accessed via the "Check / Change Ship Loadout" menu.
detailed_description:
A pack of DLC-exclusive decor to dress the Sandras up from stem to stern.

Contains the following sets:

　● Ironclad Warship Set

　　- Ironclad Warship Sails

　　- Ironclad Warship Hull

　　- Ironclad Warship Adornments

　　- Ironclad Warship Cannon

　● Undying Fleet Set

　　- Undying Fleet Sails

　　- Undying Fleet Hull

　　- Undying Fleet Adornments

　　- Undying Fleet Paddle Wheels

　● The Pikkard Set

　　- The Pikkard Adornments

　　- The Pikkard Artillery

　● Deck-oration Set

　　- Pirate Ship Deck

　　- Elegant Rugs

　● Sail & Hull Color Set

　　- Mana Wielder's Sails (Fire)

　　- Mana Wielder's Sails (Ice)

　　- Pirate Ship Sails

　　- Mana Wielder's Hull (Fire)

　　- Mana Wielder's Hull (Ice)

　　- Pirate Ship Hull

　● Shameless Sail Set

　　- Shameless Sails (Monstrum)

　　- Shameless Sails (Lacrimosa)

　● Fanatical Flag Set

　　- Fanatical Flag (Carnac Guys)

　　- Fanatical Flag (Carnac Gals)

　　- Fanatical Flag (Adol & Dana)

　　- Fanatical Flag (Aprilis)

　　- Fanatical Flag (Twin Goddesses)

*Items can be obtained by selecting the purchased content in the "DLC" tab of your Inventory, accessed via the Main Menu ingame.

*Once obtained, these items can be equipped in the "Adornments" section of the "Loadout" tab, accessed via the "Check / Change Ship Loadout" menu.
